content:
If he ever starts stocking Soda Pop-Pop,
he'll be the most swoosh~est little merchant in my heart!

Step two...{短暂停}
Buy everything from Glenn's Stall!
I mean, Glenn really knows how to stock up! He's got ready-made tools, clothes and furniture, and even rotates in new items every day!

Step one,
I need to go fishing for a while,
then trade the fish with Glenn for some Dough.
